email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you check if there’s any flexibility? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The rate is more in line with our expectations. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan to 16-19 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm this? Also, can we finalize the demurrage rate at $18,000 per day? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to 16-19 October as requested. The demurrage rate can be set at $18,000 per day. If everything looks good, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds perfect. Please go ahead with the charter party agreement. We’ll review and sign it once ready. Thanks for your assistance throughout this negotiation. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
